# [Interview #135: Dromen and Demonen Chat, Entry #33](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=135#33)

#### Miryenne

RJ: Do you remember Phoenix's fiance's sign at the booksigning?

#### Robert Jordan

No, I'm sorry I don't.
